title: 216 Cute Love Quotes & Romantic Lines for Him

steps.title: Pull at your man’s heartstrings with these touching and romantic quotes.
steps.content: Pull at your man’s heartstrings with these touching and romantic quotes. A heartfelt note left for your sweetheart can be a great way to “reinforce your adoration or love,” says dating coach John Keegan. These quotes are particularly sincere, romantic, and moving, so they should adequately let your lover know the depth of your feelings for them. “You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.” – e.e. cummings “You are, and always have been, my dream.” – Nicholas Sparks “I have found the one whom my soul loves.” – Song of Solomon 3:4 “Loving you never was an option. It was a necessity.” – Truth Devour “What is love? It is the morning and the evening star.” – Sinclair Lewis “Your hand touching mine. This is how galaxies collide.” – Sanober Khan “They say when you meet the love of your life, time stops, and that’s true.” – Big Fish “The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.” – Charles de Leusse “Love is something eternal, the aspect may change, but not the essence.” – Vincent Van Gogh “Love is the condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.” – Robert Heinlein “The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard but must be felt with the heart.” – Helen Keller “Your memory feels like home to me. So whenever my mind wanders, it always finds its way back to you.” – Ranata Suzuki

steps.title: Make it clear how deep your love is with these intense love quotes.
steps.content: Make it clear how deep your love is with these intense love quotes. Sometimes, a simple “I love you” isn’t enough to express the range of love and emotion that you feel for your partner. In that case, a deep love quote or line of poetry may be best to encapsulate and express your adoration. Try one of these deep and heartfelt messages from some of the world's most intense and thoughtful writers: [1] X Research source “Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it enkindles the great.” – Roger de Rabutin “Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.” – Lao Tzu “There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.” – Friedrich Nietzsche “Love is not blind; it sees more, not less. But because it sees more, it's willing to see less.” – Rabbi Julius Gordon “I am grateful that you were born, that your love is mine, and our two lives are woven and welded together.” – Mark Twain “Every day I discover that I love you even more, and in this infinite universe I will love you till the world ends.” – Alicia N. Green “Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.” – Antoine de Saint-Exupéry “Love is a portion of the soul itself, and it is of the same nature as the celestial breathing of the atmosphere of paradise.” – Victor Hugo “Love is not love which alters when it alteration finds, or bends with the remover to remove: O no! It is an ever-fixed mark, that looks on tempests and is never shaken.” – William Shakespeare “Anyone can love a thing because that's as easy as putting a penny in your pocket. But to love something despite. To know the flaws and love them too. That is rare and pure and perfect.” – Patrick Rothfuss “When we fall in love we are filled with the sense of how defenseless human beings are, and we tremble at the daily existence we have led in blissful obliviousness until this time. For this reason people are occasionally made virtuous by love.” – Yukio Mishima “I have a strange feeling with regard to you. As if I had a string somewhere under my left ribs, tightly knotted to a similar string in you. And if you were to leave I'm afraid that cord of communion would snap. And I have a notion that I'd take to bleeding inwardly.” – Jane Eyre

steps.title: Find a new way to say “I love you” with these poetic expressions of love.
steps.content: Find a new way to say “I love you” with these poetic expressions of love. Many great quotes evoke the feeling and expression of love, but what if you want to directly say “I love you” in the most poetic way possible? Well, we’ve got you covered, as each of the romantic quotes below includes the 3-word, 8-letter phrase that your man will be overjoyed to hear: [2] X Research source “I love you. You complete me.” – Jerry Maguire “I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.” – Ben Folds “I love you—I am at rest with you—I have come home.” – Dorothy L. Sayers “I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.” – Paulo Coelho “I’ve tried so many times to think of a new way to say it, and it’s still I love you.” – Zelda Fitzgerald “Each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.” – Rosemonde Gérard “I love you as certain dark things are loved, secretly, between the shadow and the soul.” – Pablo Neruda “All life is just a progression toward, and then a recession from, one phrase—‘I love you.’” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.” – Angelita Lim “In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." – Jane Austen ““I love you because I know no other way to love you than this: where ‘I’ does not exist, nor ‘you,’ so close that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so close that your eyes close as I fall asleep.” – Pablo Neruda “I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.” – Elizabeth Barrett Browning

steps.title: Emphasize your fairytale romance with quotes about true love.
steps.content: Emphasize your fairytale romance with quotes about true love. If you’ve been lucky enough to find true love in your life, you might as well sing it from the rooftops! These romantic quotes allude directly to true love, aka the unique, passionate, and unbreakable bond that connects you and your partner. “True love stories never have endings.” – Richard Bach “Life is a game and true love is a trophy.” – Rufus Wainwright “Rare as is true love, true friendship is rare.” – Jean de La Fontaine “The course of true love never did run smooth.” – William Shakespeare “This is true love. You think this happens every day?” – The Princess Bride “Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.” – Billy Graham “True love believes everything, and bears everything, and trusts everything.” – Charles Dickens “True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.” – Torquato Tasso “There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.” – The Truth About Forever “A true soul mate is probably the most important person you’ll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake.” – Elizabeth Gilbert, “Eat, Pray, Love” “True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.” – Honoré de Balzac “We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love.” – Robert Fulghum

steps.title: Keep things short and sweet with a brief love quote.
steps.content: Keep things short and sweet with a brief love quote. Sometimes, less and more—and these love messages pack a big punch despite their short length. Whether you’re leaving your guy a quick love note or sending him a text to remind him of your affection, these quick and simple quotes will effectively demonstrate all the love you feel. [3] X Research source “You’re my favorite notification.” – Unknown “I need you like a heart needs a beat.” – Unknown “One is very crazy when in love.” – Sigmund Freud “Love is a friendship set to music.” – Joseph Campbell “I wish I knew how to quit you.” – Brokeback Mountain “Everything means nothing if I ain't got you.” – Alicia Keys “You are the best thing that’s ever been mine.” – Taylor Swift “If I know what love is, it is because of you.” – Hermann Hesse “You can’t rush something you want to last forever.” – Unknown “We loved with a love that was more than love.” – Edgar Allen Poe “Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.” – Aristotle “You will never age for me, nor fade, nor die.” – William Shakespeare

steps.title: Make your man blush with a sweet and adoring love quote.
steps.content: Make your man blush with a sweet and adoring love quote. If you really want to make your guy feel giddy, then one of these cutesy love messages is sure to get the job done. Not only will they tell your partner just how much you love him, but they’ll also brighten up his smile and brighten up his day—which is likely one of the best gifts you could give him. [4] X Research source “It’s always better when we’re together.” – Jack Johnson “I like you very much. Just as you are.” – Bridget Jones’s Diary “Love is like pi—natural, irrational, and very important.” – Lisa Hoffman “Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.” – Albert Einstein “It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.” – Vladimir Nabokov “Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.” – Thomas Dewar “I love you more than coffee, but please don’t make me prove it.” – Elizabeth Evans “I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.” – J.R.R. Tolkien “If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk through my garden forever.” – Alfred Tennyson “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.” – A. A. Milne “I've got a problem. Once you stop this car, I'm going to hug you, and kiss you, and then I'll never be able to let you go.” – Homer Simpson “It was only a sunny smile, and little it cost in the giving, but like morning light it scattered the night and made the day worth living.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald

steps.title: Give your guy giggles galore while reminding him of your everlasting love.
steps.content: Give your guy giggles galore while reminding him of your everlasting love. If your partner is known for his funny bone, infusing a bit of humor into your love note can go a long way. These silly messages are also a great pick for a day when he “has something going at work that’s important…or some big challenge [ahead].” Leaving him a funny and supportive note will let your bf know that you’ll “be thinking about [him] all day and sending good energy his way,” explains Keegan. “I think you are suffering from a lack of vitamin me.” – Unknown “I stole U from the alphabet because U belong to me!” – Unknown “It wasn’t love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.” – Lucille Ball “If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question?” – Lily Tomlin “Of all the tools I have in the kitchen, you're the jar opener I love the most.” – Unknown “I love you no matter what you do, but do you have to do so much of it?” – Jean Illsley Clarke “My love is meatloaf flavored. I just wish my meatloaf was also meatloaf flavored.” – Dora J. Arod “I didn’t want to fall in love, not at all. But at some point you smiled and holy sh*t I blew it.” – Unknown “I love being married. It’s so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.” – Rita Rudner “I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.” – Iona Mink “Spend a few minutes a day really listening to your spouse. No matter how stupid his problems sound to you.” – Megan Mullally “Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come.” – Matt Groening

steps.title: Spice things up and strengthen your bond with some sensual love quotes.
steps.content: Spice things up and strengthen your bond with some sensual love quotes. Physical intimacy is an important part of many romantic relationships, so why not lean into your sexy side with these spicy love quotes? Text your partner a quote while they’re off at work, or leave one as a written note for them to find—these romantic yet sensual messages are a great way to set the mood for later. [5] X Research source “I wanna be on you.” – Anchorman “You can have me anywhere.” – Casino Royale “When I’m good, I’m very good, but when I’m bad, I’m better.” – Mae West “A sea of whisky couldn’t intoxicate me as much as a drop of you.” – JS Parker “He was now in that state of fire that she loved. She wanted to be burnt.” – Anaïs Nin “He’s like the brightest flame, and it takes everything in me to resist its call.” – D.L. Hess “I have a crush on your mind. I fell for your personality. Your looks are just a bonus.” – The Notebook “I gasp, and I'm Eve in the Garden of Eden, and he's the serpent, and I cannot resist.” – Fifty Shades of Grey “My heart beats faster as you take my hand. My love grows stronger as you touch my soul.” – A.C. Van Cherub “Let me paint your lips with the stars… so that I don’t need to go light-years each night to kiss them.” – Samba Shiva Thadavarthi “My soul made love to your soul long before our bodies met. When I first laid my eyes on you, I recognized you. You held my future in your hands.” – Anita Krizzan “I desire to be with you. I miss you. I feel lonely when I can't see you. I am obsessed with you, fascinated by you, infatuated with you. I hunger for your taste, your smell, the feel of your soul touching mine.” – Jack Llawayllyn

steps.title: Send your cowboy cutie a love message to rival his love for Dolly Parton.
steps.content: Send your cowboy cutie a love message to rival his love for Dolly Parton. If your man’s a fan of country music—from twangy vocals to honky-tonk bars—then take a direct quote from the lyrics of one of his favorite artists. After all, no one knows devotion and dramatic declarations of love like a country singer! Here are just a few of the most heartfelt quotes from classic country tunes: [6] X Research source “The taste of love is sweet / When hearts like ours meet.” – Johnny Cash, “Ring of Fire” “My heart's never smiled so hard / Baby, lovin' you is fun.” – Easton Corbin, “Lovin’ You is Fun” “When I’m lying wrapped up in your arms / The whole world just fades away.” – Faith Hill, “Breathe” “And I don't mind if we take our time / 'Cause I'm all yours if you're all mine.” – Defeater, “I Don’t Mind” “We share our hearts, our souls, and our minds / When we make love” – Alabama, “When We Make Love” “Oh I do wish you joy / And I wish you happiness / But above all this / I wish you love.” – Dolly Parton, “I Will Always Love You” “You're still the one I run to / The one that I belong to / You're still the one I want for life.” – Shania Twain, “You’re Still the One” “Could I have this dance for the rest of my life? / Would you be my partner every night?” – Anne Murray, “Could I Have This Dance” “Without you there'd be no sun in my sky / There would be no love in my life / There'd be no world left for me / And I, baby I don't know what I would do” – Trisha Yearwood, “How Do I Live” “If I told you that I realized you're all I ever wanted / And it's killing me to be so far away / Would you tell me that you love me too?” – Carrie Underwood and Randy Travis, “I Told You So” “It's your love / It just does something to me / It sends a shock right through me / I can't get enough / And if you wonder about the spell I'm under / Oh it's your love.” – Tim McGraw and Faith Hill, "Your Love" “I wanna feel that way / Yeah, I wanna hold you close / Oh, if you still love me, I wanna feel that way / Don't just assume I know. Baby, remind me, remind me.” – Carrie Underwood and Brad Paisley, “Remind Me”

steps.title: Remind your bf that his absence has only made your love grow stronger.
steps.content: Remind your bf that his absence has only made your love grow stronger. If you’re in a long-distance coupling, then it can be difficult to find ways to stay connected. These love quotes for couples who are separated will kill two birds with one stone: they’ll give you a way to express your love, despite the distance, as well as provide an inspirational and assuring message about the strength and endurance of long-distance relationships. [7] X Research source “Ocean separates lands, not souls.” – Munia Khan “i carry your heart with me (i carry it in my heart).” – e.e. cummings “Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.” – Benjamin Franklin “Distance means so little, when someone means so much.” – Tom McNeal “I want to be with you. It’s as simple and as complicated as that.” – Charles Bukowski “How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.” – A.A. Milne “When two souls are one, they hear each other, even in silence.” – Matshona Dhliwayo “Ah, but a man’s reach should exceed his grasp, or what’s a heaven for?” – Robert Browning “The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.” – Nicholas Sparks “They sit together, physically separate but utterly connected by the moment they’ve created.” – Stan Lee “And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.” – Khalil Gibran “My dear, I think of you always and at night I build myself a warm nest of things I remember and float in your sweetness till morning.” – Zelda Fitzgerald

steps.title: Borrow the words of famous authors and artists to express your love.
steps.content: Borrow the words of famous authors and artists to express your love. Of course, any quote allows you to adapt the famous phrases of a notable person, but these quotes are particularly perfect for any lover of books, films, and music. Whether your man is a diehard Swiftie or a Nora Ephron-loving cinephile, these universally romantic quotes will make your relationship feel better than fiction: [8] X Research source “To me, you are perfect.” – Mark, Love Actually “You are my greatest adventure.” – The Incredibles “All I ever wanted / All I want is / Always you / It’s always you.” – Mitski, “I Will” “Can I go where you go? / Can we always be this close, forever and ever?” – Taylor Swift, “Lover” “Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.” – Emily Brontë, “Wuthering Heights” “In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.” – Virginia Woolf, Selected Diaries “I hope you don’t mind that I put down in words how wonderful life is while you’re in the world.” – Elton John, "Your Song" “Love is not just looking at each other, it’s looking in the same direction.” – Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, Wind, Sand and Stars “Come away with me and we’ll kiss / On a mountaintop / Come away with me / And I’ll never stop loving you.” – Norah Jones, “Come Away With Me” “I’m scared of walking out of this room and never feeling the rest of my whole life the way I feel when I’m with you.” – Baby Houseman, Dirty Dancing “When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.” – Harry Burns, When Harry Met Sally “But in a solitary life, there are rare moments when another soul dips near yours, as stars once a year brush the earth. Such a constellation was he to me.” – Madeline Miller, Circe

Love quotes are an easy, heartfelt, and effective way to show affection and adoration to your man . However, there are many other ways to make your man feel loved around the clock—and we’re here to help you master them all!
